name: Orbit Quest
description:
Help Ava Knight find her way back home from the edge of the universe!



Ava knight's first mission has gone terribly wrong. Her home was attack by an alien race created by humans and before she could come back to help she was sucked into a wormhole and sent to the edge of the universe. Now she needs to get back before it is too late and save her home.

  • Narrative driven, space adventure with eccentric characters, lots of humor and a story about forging your own path
  • Unique and surprising game play challenges
  • Intense boss battles
  • Incredible, original score that is highly-dynamic
  • Reactive soundscape
  • Tons of new ships to unlock and secrets to discover
  • Great game for speed running

The game is built around the concept of hopping from one orbit to the other. While it may seem simple there are many layers of depth that must be mastered in order to traverse this difficult universe. The last colony of humanity is counting on you!
